pr_title: Removed BIB file directory from search when preferences has option unchecked

timeline.bodyText: Why did you move the mockings here?
timeline.author: Siedlerchr

replies.bodyText: This mocking of getFileDirectoriesAsPaths method returns non empty values, which is not applicable for the newly added test case testFindAssociatedNotLinkedFilesForEmptySearchDir. The new test case expects that getFileDirectoriesAsPaths would return empty list.
replies.author: silverhorse

replies.bodyText: Okay, but the externalFileType should be independent of this
replies.author: Siedlerchr

replies.bodyText: yeah, agreed. I will move that one back to setup.
replies.author: silverhorse

timeline.message: Merge branch 'fix-for-issue-5891' of https://github.com/silverhorse/jabref into fix-for-issue-5891
reverting change from other properties files
Merge branch 'master' of https://github.com/JabRef/jabref into fix-for-issue-5891
